desc: We deliver the widest, most trusted system for adding color to polished concrete. One way that we can provide you with consistent results is by identifying the best application method for our products, which is exactly what we did with the Patriot SpraySafe System.

layout.text: We deliver the widest, most trusted system for adding color to polished concrete. One way that we can provide you with consistent results is by identifying the best application method for our products, which is exactly what we did with the Patriot SpraySafe System.
